answers.answer: So you took the Gestational Diabetes test and they found your numbers to be high? Did you take just the 1 hour test or did you take the 3 hour test as well?  If you fail the 3 hour Gestational Diabetes test, Your doctor will probably have you talk to a nutritionist to change up your diet.  High sugar could mean that your baby will be bigger than the average baby, which can complicate childbirth.  Getting your sugar in check now can minimize that.  You may have to test your blood sugar at home and some women need to take insulin if their sugar is too high. Many women end up with gestational diabetes and have perfectly healthy babies. It's just a matter of taking care of yourself at this point.

question: I'm 31wks & my Dr says I have high sugar. What does that mean? Is it bad? What is gonna be different about my pregnancy? What should I do? Help me please!
title: high sugar?
